sourcesContent: import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import './App.scss' import BottomResultBox from './components/BottomResultBox' import Footer from './components/Footer' import Navbar from './components/Navbar' import ResultBox from './components/ResultBox' import TextArea from './components/TextArea' const App = () => { const [isActive, setIsActive] = useState(false) useEffect(() => { setIsActive(true) }, []) return ( <>
